title: I-35E Dallas Zoo Deck Park
text: The reconstruction of I-35E, called the Southern Gateway project, includes a new park which will be above the freeway on a new deck between Marsalis and Ewing Avenues.

images.caption: Looking northbound from the Marsalis bridge
Looking northbound from the Marsalis bridge, showing the beams for the deck over the future northbound lanes.
Looking northbound from the Marsalis bridge
Looking northbound from the Marsalis bridge
This photos shows the southbound lanes on the left are complete, in the final lowered location.
The northbound frontage road, looking northbound at Marsalis, dips below the deck level and will be isolated from the park.
Looking south at Ewing Avenue, showing the deck beams in position over the future northbound lanes.
